abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33226860, pmid32392330, pmid33177276, pmid33175602, pmid33174650, pmid33225952, pmid33215961, pmid33185036, pmid33179525, pmid32789730, pmid33231483, pmid33180932
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.11.30
